[Welcome to
City of Springtown

![Welcome navigate](https://i.civicweb.net/Global/Images/portalicons/RotatorNavigateImage.png)](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/Portal/Welcome.aspx)

Welcome to our Portal! Our community prides itself on strong, long running traditions. One of these traditions is getting our community engaged with what is going on at City Hall. We are pleased to introduce our Portal. The portal increases transparency by enabling our citizens to learn about meetings, search for documents, view reports, and more!

Within our Portal, you can:

![Untitled (2).png](https://i.civicweb.net/Global/Images/portal/550/welcome-tile.jpg)* View our live stream to watch meetings as they happen at City Hall.

  ![View current or upcoming live stream event](https://i.civicweb.net/Global/Images/portal/300/video-tile.jpg)
![search](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/300/virtual-library-tile.jpg)* Subscribe to receive email updates for meetings that interest you.

  ![subscribe](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/300/subscribe-tile.jpg)
* Apply for City’s boards, committees or commissions.

  ![Apply for a Board or Commission](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/250/boardapplication-tile.jpg)
![voting](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/300/attendance-voting-tile.jpg)
![gavel](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/300/custom-tile-3456.jpg)
![folders](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/250/custom-tile-3457.jpg)
![Placeholder](https://i.civicweb.net/Global/Images/portal/300/filler-1-tile.jpg)
